docs.text: zend-expressive-authentication-zendauthentication Repository abandoned 2019-12-31 This repository has moved to mezzio/mezzio-authentication-laminasauthentication . This library provides a zend-authentication adapter for use with zend-expressive-authentication . Installation Run the following to install this library: $ composer require zendframework/zend-expressive-authentication-zendauthentication Documentation Documentation is in the doc tree , and can be compiled using mkdocs : $ mkdocs build You may also browse the documentation online .
docs.title: zend-expressive-authentication-zendauthentication
